title: Rockson1
author: Rockson1
content: I am a new beginner  so I want to know what is involved in the crypto space, information is very important as its needed to fully guide yourself into any step you are about to take  in life so that  is why I need more enlightenment about the crypto world, Today in my locality many awareness is going on about cryptocurrency and I feel left behind as  am currently tired of the whole fiat system and need to know other alternatives about using bitcoin as a means to financial freedom.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Yes, it's important to stay informed and continue your learning journey. There are many ways to learn, so here are some suggestions for you. You can join online forums, like this one, join discussion groups on social media platforms like Reddit, and ask questions. Yo can read books and articles written by people who have experience with these technologies. You can also watch videos and online courses to learn more about this area. You can also find a mentor who has experience with these technologies. If you know someone who is an expert, ask them if they would be willing to talk about their experiences and give you some tips for learning more. Everyone has a different approach to learning, so it's important to find what works best for you. Don't be afraid to ask questions and seek help from others.

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: I honestly have no idea what this topic is all about. Someone is dissatisfied with the entire fiat system and supports bitcoin as a means of achieving financial freedom. Like fiat, bitcoin is just money. Did you anticipate earlier that the traditional fiat system would grant you financial freedom? While its long-term value may rise, there is no assurance that it will grant you financial freedom. In order to invest or start your own business, you need a steady income, which means you need to put in more effort.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: The secret to living a successful life is information. You are kind of deformed if you are not informed.Quote from: Rockson1 on February 10, 2023, 04:55:36 PMI am a new beginner  so I want to know what is involved in the crypto space, information is very important as its needed to fully guide yourself into any step you are about to take  in life so that  is why I need more enlightenment about the crypto world, Today in my locality many awareness is going on about cryptocurrency and I feel left behind as  am currently tired of the whole fiat system and need to know other alternatives about using bitcoin as a means to financial freedom. My 2cent advice to you on crypto: If you want to learn more about cryptocurrency, this forum is a wonderful place to start. Look over the forum and familiarize yourself with it. Keep in mind that investing in crypto does not guarantee financial success. Although there are thousands of alternative cryptocurrencies, bitcoin dominates the market (number 1). On coinmarketcap, you can learn more about the rankings of all coins. When investing in cryptocurrencies, only use money that you can afford to lose. Don't invest all of your savings in bitcoin with the expectation that you will become financially independent soon.
